HeroSection.subtitle: Transform your learning journey with expert instructors, interactive courses, and proven methods. Join thousands of students who have achieved mastery through our comprehensive programs.
HeroSection.available_subtitle: Choose from our diverse range of language programs

ServicesSection.title: Our Educational Services
ServicesSection.subtitle: Programs designed for your success, from language learning to complete academic support.
ServicesSection.s1_desc: Comprehensive programs (English, French, Spanish, etc.) adapted to your level, from beginner to advanced.
ServicesSection.s2_desc: Targeted coaching to succeed in your official certifications: TOEFL, IELTS, DELF/DALF, and more.
ServicesSection.s3_desc: Strengthen your speaking fluency with our immersive and dynamic discussion groups.
ServicesSection.s4_desc: Solid foundations in reading, writing, and arithmetic for a fulfilling school life. All subjects.
ServicesSection.s5_desc: Consolidation of knowledge and effective work methodology for all subjects (Math, Science, Languages...).
ServicesSection.s6_desc: Intensive preparation for exams (Bac) in key subjects: Math, Physics, Philosophy, History-Geo, etc.
ServicesSection.s7_desc: Master business English, professional communication, and other key skills for your career.
ServicesSection.s8_desc: Learn how to learn. Develop effective organizational and memorization methods.
ServicesSection.s9_desc: 'Bootcamp' programs during school holidays for rapid and targeted progress.

BundleSection.title: B2B On-site Training
BundleSection.subtitle: Language, IT, and HSE programs at our academy, in partnership with DevLab.

AboutPage.subtitle: Discover the mission, values, and team at the heart of our educational project.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: We are committed to providing excellent, accessible education, rooted in local realities while being open to the world. We are training the talents who will build the future.
mission.paragraph2: Our goal is to bridge the gap between ambition and success by offering innovative curricula, expert faculty, and a close-knit community.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We aim for the highest quality in our teaching, our support, and our administration.

passion.title: Passion for Learning
passion.description: We are passionate about education and inspire a desire to learn and excel.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We adopt modern pedagogy and powerful tools for effective learning.

community.title: Community
community.description: We foster an environment of mutual support, respect, and collaboration among students and faculty.

founder.name: The Management
founder.description: A visionary team dedicated to building a center of educational excellence in Algeria.

academic.name: The Faculty
academic.description: Ensuring academic excellence and close guidance for our students.

tech.name: The Administrative Staff
tech.description: Ensuring a smooth learning experience and an optimal working environment.

item1.title: Pedagogical Excellence
item1.description: To offer cutting-edge education aligned with the best academic standards.

item2.title: Student Success
item2.description: To place the development and success of each student at the heart of our priorities.

item3.title: Active Pedagogy
item3.description: To integrate the latest technologies and teaching methods for dynamic learning.

item4.title: Professional Integration
item4.description: To build strong bridges with the business world for the future of our graduates.

cta.title: Ready to Join Us?
cta.description: Join our community and be among the pioneers of this new educational adventure.

AboutSection.title: Transforming Language Education
AboutSection.subtitle: We are committed to providing world-class language education through innovative technology and dedicated teaching. Join thousands of students who have achieved their language goals with LingoLab.

feature1.title: Expert Instructors
feature1.description: Learn from certified language professionals with years of teaching experience and cultural expertise.

feature2.title: Interactive Community
feature2.description: Connect with fellow learners in our vibrant forum and practice conversations in real-time.

feature3.title: Global Recognition
feature3.description: Earn internationally recognized certificates that boost your academic and professional credentials.

feature4.title: Proven Methods
feature4.description: Benefit from evidence-based teaching approaches that guarantee measurable progress and fluency.

mission.title: Our Mission: Breaking Language Barriers
mission.description: We believe that language learning should be accessible, engaging, and effective. Through our innovative platform, we empower learners to connect with the world, unlock new opportunities, and embrace diverse cultures.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Clients Say
TestimonialsSection.t1_text: LingoLab transformed our online presence. Our e-commerce site is fast, modern, and sales have increased by 150%!
TestimonialsSection.t2_text: Excellent web development training. The team is professional and the post-training follow-up is impeccable.
TestimonialsSection.t3_text: A trusted partner for our digital transformation. Their expertise and responsiveness make the difference.

ContactSection.title: Contact Us
ContactSection.subtitle: Ready to Start Your Learning Journey?
ContactSection.description: Our team is here to help you choose the perfect program for your goals
ContactSection.service2_desc: Personalized help for all school levels
ContactSection.cta_text: Join thousands of students who have transformed their future with us

Footer.description: Your trusted technology partner in Algeria for web, mobile, and digital transformation.

BundlePage.b2bSubtitle: Train your teams in our academy and develop your skills.
BundlePage.pageSubtitleB2B: Complete on-site solutions for your team's success

team.name: Team Plan
team.description: Get your team on the path to success with on-site training.

business.name: Business Plan
business.description: The complete solution for continuous growth.

enterprise.name: Enterprise Plan
enterprise.description: A customized partnership for your global objectives.

BundlePage.includedSubtitleB2B: A comprehensive portfolio to cover all your skill needs

bonusB2B.title: Organized Onboarding
bonusB2B.desc: Session planning and placement tests included.

bonusB2B.title: ROI Measurement
bonusB2B.desc: Clear reports to measure the impact of the training.

bonusB2B.title: Premium Environment
bonusB2B.desc: Modern and equipped classrooms for learning.

bonusB2B.title: Certifications
bonusB2B.desc: Recognized end-of-training certificates for each employee.

faqsB2B.q: How do you measure our employees' progress?
faqsB2B.a: Our platform offers an HR dashboard that tracks attendance. In addition, our trainers conduct regular on-site assessments (tests, role-playing).

faqsB2B.q: Does the training take place at our offices?
faqsB2B.a: Our Team and Business plans take place on-site at our academy to ensure an optimal learning environment. The Enterprise plan allows for dedicated sessions at your premises.
We prioritize quality. Our groups range from 6 (Business) to 10 (Team) participants maximum to ensure optimal interaction and participation.

faqsB2B.q: Can we customize the content (HSE, Tech)?
faqsB2B.a: Absolutely. The Enterprise plan is 100% custom-made. We can adapt HSE or Tech modules to your internal procedures or specific equipment.

BundlePage.ctaSubtitleB2B: Let's discuss your goals and plan your on-site training sessions.
